duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement ML solutions to enhance ad-serving pathways and optimize operational decision making without tracking user behaviors.
Translate business, product, and engineering requirements into ML solutions and conduct exploratory analyses to refine the ML roadmap.
Query and structure large datasets for model development using Spark and SQL.
Contribute to MLOps workflows and establish a scalable ML Platform for other engineers and data scientists to use.
Train, experiment, and tune ML problem statements in order to find optimal solutions and develop KPIs in the BI platform to track and monitor model performance.
Serve as a mentor to other Data Scientists and Engineers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Economics or related quantitative field (Advanced degree preferred)
